record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Consulting architect stamp, letter to J. Lee Jones from Bob Warner, Beaumont, Heller and Spelling, Inc. [Publicity and PR]: Enclosed is a set of photographs which we are releasing to Mechanical Contractor Magazine with the article on the Ingersoll-Rand Pumps in your Hospital for Chronic Diseases. Since you may want to file these with your copy of the article, we have marked each with a figure number corresponding to the captions that accompanied the article." Dated 1964.
